http://www.uncyclopedia.org/wiki/Category:Games

un pedacito de mortal kombat:

"As is well known, all fighting game series have some sort of gimmikk to
help them stand out from the krowd. Street Fighter revolutionised the genre
by taking the fighting out into the streets, instead of in a ring, as all
the previous games had been.

Mortal Kombat's gimmikk was to replake all instankes of the letter 'C' with
the letter 'K' (bekause of that feature, it was one of the first
applikations to bekome part of KDE). There was also something about kopious
amounts of blood and violenke. Parents were outraged by the fakt that Mortal
Kombat kontained kopious amounts of nonsensikal spelling errors and the
outrage was so great that the United States Kongress held hearings. The
hearings and the great konkern about spelling errors in video games
eventually lead to the formation of the USB ratings."


-- 
Este mensaje ha sido analizado por el Antivirus
